about: BABA ZMAN is more than just a camp - we're a community of creators, dreamers, and doers who believe in the transformative power of shared experiences. Our camp embodies the spirit of radical self-expression, communal effort, and leaving no trace while creating unforgettable moments in the desert.

values.title: Radical Inclusion
values.description: Everyone is welcome in our camp family, regardless of background, experience, or identity.

values.title: Communal Effort
values.description: We build, create, and maintain our camp together. Every contribution matters.

values.title: Creative Expression
values.description: We encourage and support all forms of artistic and personal expression.

values.title: Leave No Trace
values.description: We respect our desert home and leave it better than we found it.

values.title: Participation
values.description: We are all participants, not spectators. Everyone contributes to the magic.

teams.name: Art Team
teams.description: Creates installations, facilitates workshops, and brings beauty to our camp space.

teams.name: Build Team
teams.description: Constructs and maintains camp infrastructure, shade structures, and common areas.

teams.name: Kitchen Team
teams.description: Plans and prepares communal meals, manages food supplies and dietary needs.

teams.name: Safety Team
teams.description: Ensures camp safety, provides first aid, and maintains emergency protocols.

teams.name: Logistics Team
teams.description: Coordinates supplies, transportation, and day-to-day camp operations.

teams.name: DJ/Music Team
teams.description: Curates soundscapes, manages sound equipment, and creates musical experiences.

codeOfConduct: Respect all camp members and their boundaries
Contribute actively to camp life and maintenance
Support a safe and inclusive environment
Communicate openly and resolve conflicts peacefully
Take care of shared resources and spaces
